properties.entry: SELECT EVNET_NO, EVNET_TITLE, CONTENT, TERM, COUNT, USER_ID, STATUS FROM EVENT_BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY EVNET_NO DESC
SELECT EVNET_NO, EVNET_TITLE, CONTENT, TERM, COUNT, USER_ID, STATUS FROM EVENT_BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND EVNET_NO = ?
UPDATE EVENT_BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE EVNET_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO EVENT_BOARD ( EVNET_NO, EVNET_TITLE, CONTENT, TERM, COUNT, USER_ID, STATUS ) VALUES ( seq_eno.nextval, ?, ?, ?, 0, 1, DEFAULT )
UPDATE EVENT_BOARD SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE EVNET_NO = ?
UPDATE EVENT_BOARD SET EVNET_TITLE = ?, CONTENT = ?, TERM = ? WHERE EVNET_NO = ?
SELECT EVNET_NO, EVNET_TITLE, CONTENT, TERM, COUNT, USER_ID, STATUS FROM EVENT_BOARD WHERE EVNET_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' AND STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY EVNET_NO DESC
